name: Bug Boy (NocturneGames)
description:
It's time to venture out into the redwood forest and find some funky little buggy friends.

Arrow keys to move

Z to use Net

X to use Knife

Made with Gamemaker

Dirt sprites used from https://finalbossblues.itch.io/tf-jungle-tileset

Gamemaker exports don't work well with windows so you will likely get a malware warning from downloading this game. Should still be fine to download.
